attributes.action: Increase Harrow Council's Budget per head in line with other boroughs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harrow Council has approx over £100   per head less than their nearest borough,this has led to an increase in council tax of 4.1%.This is extortionate considering we pay one of the highest council taxes in London.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase Harrow Council's Budget per head in line with other boroughs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11908.asp

Prime Minister's Office
